This program is only offered as a full-fee program. 2025 full-fee place: AU$2,500* total *Fees shown are indicative only and subject to change given individual circumstances at the time of enrolment. Use ourfee finderto get an estimate of your fees for this program. Student services and amenities fee (SSAF): AU$365 maximum fee* for 2025.*Note: *SSAF will be charged per nominal hour at a rate of $0.51 per hour.Other items related to your program, including field trips, textbooks and equipment.The student tuition fees as displayed by the fee finder are indicative only and subject to change given individual circumstances at enrolment. Fees are adjusted on an annual basis and these fees should only be used as a guide.
